attributes.action: create a traffic management review panel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to create a Speed limit and traffic calming review panel, to provide a central point for road users to appeal against inappropriate speed limits, such as 30mph limits on large dual carriage ways, and unnecessary road narrowing. Roads need to be standardised across the country so as everyone can benefit from good road management techniques.
